item.title: GetReloadOptions.cs
item.description: //----------------------------------------------------------------------- // <copyright file="GetReloadOptions.cs" company="Softlayer"> // SoftLayer Technologies, Inc. // </copyright> // <license> // http://sldn.softlayer.com/article/License // </license> //----------------------------------------------------------------------- namespace VirtualGuests { using System; class GetReloadOptions { /// <summary> /// Get Reload Options /// This script retrieves all options available for reload from a Virtual Guest. It is only necessary /// to declare the hostname from the vsi that you wish to reload operating system and the type of operating system. /// For more information, review the following links: /// </summary> /// <manualPages> /// http://sldn.
